content.raw:
We have convenient functions to convert gazebo messages to/from SDF, but we're missing some. Here's the current status, we can update as the functions are added.

|      | ToSDF | FromSDF |
| --- | --------- | ------------ |
| TrackVisual |  | yes |
| GUI |  | yes |
| Light | yes | yes |
| Mesh | yes | yes |
| Geometry | yes | yes |
| Visual | yes | yes |
| Collision | yes | yes |
| Surface | yes | yes |
| Friction |  | yes |
| Axis |  | yes |
| Joint | yes | yes |
| Plugin | yes | yes |
| Material | yes |  |
| Fog |  | yes |
| Scene |  | yes |
| Sensor |  | yes |
| CameraSensor | yes | yes |
| RaySensor |  | yes |
| ContactSensor |  | yes |
| Link | yes |  |
| Inertial | yes |  |
| Model | yes |  |
| GPSSensor | yes | yes |
| SensorNoise | yes | yes |
| ImuSensor | yes | yes |
| LogicalCameraSensor | yes | yes |
| DepthCameraSensor | | |
| WideAngleCameraSensor | | |
| MultiCameraSensor | | |
